items.title: Boeing Secures Strategic Satellite Deal, Cementing Role in U.S. Space Defense Infrastructure
items.description: Boeing (NYSE:BA) is one of the best space stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On July 3, 2025, Boeing secured a significant $2.8 billion contract with the U.S. Space Force to develop and produce the first two, and potentially up to four, Evolved Strategic Satellite Communications (ESS) vehicles, integral to the nation’s next-generation nuclear command, […]
